rationale: Students of diploma Information and Communication Technology Engineering need to have a thorough understanding of concepts of Digital and data Communication. Diploma students undertaking this course are expected to apply the fundamentals of digital and data communication system to analyze the different digital communication (Modulation and Demodulation) methods and recent trends in the field of digital and data communication, this course develop skills required to manage digital communication systems to meet the expectations of the industry. Students also can learn how to stay updated on emerging communication tools and trends.
competency: Maintenance and implementation of digital Communication Systems.

courseOutcomes.description: Understand the principles of digital and data communication.
Analyze the principles and characteristics of key digital modulation techniques.
Apply different coding techniques for source, channel and line.
Use data transmission modes for various data formats.
Familiarize with recent trends and challenges in digital/data communication.

underpinningTheory.unitTitle: Introduction to Digital and data communication system

unitOutcomes.description: Explain function of given block of digital communication system
Define bit rate, baud rate and bandwidth
Selection of communication channel based on need.
Classify the given multiplexing techniques based on domain of working
State Advantages and disadvantages of digital system

topics.title: Elements of Digital Communication system with its Block diagram
Multiplexing – Need and methods of multiplexing
Basic modes of communication
subtopics: broad casting and point to point communication

topics.title: Fundamental limitation of digital communication system
Advantages and disadvantages of digital communication system

unitOutcomes.description: Summarize the shift keying techniques
Explain generation of given type of shift keying signals
Compare salient features of the given type of digital modulation techniques.
State the significance of probability in communication
Define Entropy and Information and its physical significance, their units
State Channel Capacity in terms of SNR and explain its importance
Use appropriate source coding technique based on need.
Apply error detection and correction techniques for given data bits.
Use different line coding techniques

topics.title: Channel coding: Error, causes of error and its effect
Line Coding Techniques
subtopics: classification of line codes-Unipolar RZ and NRZ

unitOutcomes.description: Data Communication: Characteristics and Components of Data Communication
Data transmission mode: simplex, half duplex, full duplex
Data transmission techniques: I. Serial data communication: synchronous and asynchronous ii. Parallel data communication
Data representation
Multimedia Communications: Multimedia Communication Model, Elements of Multimedia Systems
Multimedia processing for communication: digital media, signal processing elements, digital audio file formats, digital image file formats, digital video file formats

topics.title: Data Communication: Characteristics and Components of Data Communication
Data transmission techniques
subtopics: Serial data communication: synchronous and asynchronous

unitOutcomes.description: Explain block diagram of satellite communication
Interpret the aspects of spread spectrum techniques
familiarize with edge computing, quantum communication.
Identify privacy considerations in data communication

topics.title: Ethical and Privacy Considerations in Data Communication

practicalExercises.description: Study the Elements of Digital Communication system with its block diagram: source, channel, transmitter and receiver
Generate and analyze the waveform of Amplitude Shift Keying (ASK) modulator and demodulator
Generate and analyze the waveform of Frequency Shift Keying (FSK) modulator and demodulator
Generate and analyze the waveform of Phase Shift Keying (PSK) modulator and demodulator
Identify the different phase shifts generated in Quadrature Phase Shift Keying Modulation
Test the performance for 4 input Time Division Multiplexing (TDM) Circuit
Test the performance for 2 input Frequency Division Multiplexing (FDM) Circuit
Generate Time Division Multiplexing (TDM) signal using relevant simulation software
Generate Frequency Division Multiplexing (FDM) signal using relevant simulation software
Generate Huffman code using relevant simulation software
Generate Shannon Fano code using relevant simulation software
Generate Error correcting code using relevant simulation software
Generate Error Detecting code-Parity code using relevant simulation software
Check the performance of various line code techniques by encoding and decoding data.
Serial data transmission: reading and writing data using relevant simulation software
File formats supported by relevant simulation software for signal processing
Conversion of Audio & Video files into various format using "Format Factory"
Audio signal Processing using relevant simulation software
Video signal Processing using relevant simulation software
Study the Elements of satellite Communication system with its block diagram.
Study the 5G system standards

specificationTable.unitTitle: Introduction to Digital and data communication system

performanceIndicators.indicator: Operate the equipment setup or circuit

hardware: Spectrum analyzer, 9 kHz to 1.5 GHz Frequency Range, Typical -135 dBm Displayed Average Noise Level (DANL)
CRO – Dual trace, 20 MHz Choice of any one built-in option, 30 MHz Bandwidth
RF generator/wideband oscillator Wide Frequency Range 100 KHz to 150 MHz
Function Generator: Frequency Range 0.1 Hz to 1 MHZ
Digital Communication Trainer, In-build internal data generator, Type of Modulations and Demodulations: ASK, FSK, BPSK, QPSK, 8-PSK, 16-QAM
Time Division and Frequency Division Multiplexing -Demultiplexing trainer
Line coding encoder/ decoder trainer kit
software: Computer system with operating system: Windows 7 or higher Ver., macOS, and Linux, with 4GB or higher RAM

affectiveDomainOutcomes: Prepare the list of equipment required in laboratory session.
studentActivities: Simulate the learned circuit using any circuit simulation software.
Prepare Presentation on any one topic learned.
instructionalStrategies: Massive open online courses (MOOCs) may be used to teach various topics/subtopics.
About 20% of the topics/sub-topics which are relatively simpler or descriptive in nature can be given to the students for self-learning, but to be assessed using different assessment methods.
Using different instructional methods for teaching.

microProjects.title: ASK, FSK, PSK, QPSK and QAM Modulator and Demodulator
microProjects.description: Implement a simple various digital modulator and demodulator using a microcontroller /PYTHON/MATLAB

microProjects.title: ASK, FSK, PSK, QPSK and QAM Modulator and Demodulator Wireless Communication
microProjects.description: Develop a wireless communication system using various digital modulator and demodulator

microProjects.title: Source coding techniques implementation
microProjects.description: Implement source coding techniques like Arithmetic coding, Run-Length Encoding, Delta coding

microProjects.title: Channel coding techniques implementation
microProjects.description: Implement channel coding techniques like error correction code, Convolution Coding and Viterbi Decoding, Turbo Codes, BCH code, LDPC (Low-Density Parity-Check) Codes

microProjects.title: Parallel Data Transfer using General Purpose Input/output (GPIO)
microProjects.description: Parallel Data Transfer using General Purpose Input/output (GPIO)

microProjects.title: 5G Massive MIMO (Multiple Input Multiple Output)
microProjects.description: Build a micro project that demonstrates the benefits of Massive MIMO in 5G.

microProjects.title: Satellite Ground Station Setup
microProjects.description: Create a satellite ground station using a software-defined radio (SDR) or other communication equipment

microProjects.title: Orbital Mechanics Simulation
microProjects.description: Develop a simulation program that models satellite orbits using basic orbital mechanics equations

microProjects.title: LEO, MEO and GEO satellite model tracker
microProjects.description: LEO, MEO and GEO satellite model tracker
